name: securepoll_log
comment: Log of actions performed by election admins.

columns.name: spl_election_id
columns.comment: ID of the election on which the action was performed

columns.name: spl_user
columns.comment: ID of the user who performed the action

columns.name: spl_type
columns.comment: The type of action performed. May be any ActionPage::LOG_TYPE_ constant

columns.name: spl_target
columns.comment: ID of the user on whom the action was performed. Null if spl_type is ActionPage::LOG_TYPE_ACCESSDATA
